body.p: For pulmonary function, parasympathetic nervous system activation can be expected to cause _____________, while sympathetic activation can be expected to cause ______________ in the lungs.

feedback.p: Incorrect. Bronchoconstriction compromises breathing and would not support an optimal use of the pulmonary airways in a “fight or flight” situation.
Incorrect. Bronchodilation would support an optimal use of the pulmonary airways in an escape situation associated with sympathetic nervous system activation.
Incorrect. Sympathetic nervous system activation causes constriction of essentially all the blood vessels of the body.

Correct. Bronchoconstriction is consistent with a state of rest. Bronchodilation would support an optimal use of the pulmonary airways in an escape situation associated with sympathetic nervous system activation.
Incorrect. Bronchoconstriction compromises breathing and would not support an optimal use of the pulmonary airways in a “fight or flight” situation.

hint.p: Think about which scenarios best fit with rest and digest, and which fit best with fight or flight.
